name: Glalie
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.

poke_body.name: Craggy Face
poke_body.effect: As long as Glalie is your Active Pokémon, any damage done by attacks from your opponent’s Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Intimidation Pebble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can’t play any Trainer cards or Supporter cards from his or her hand during your opponent’s next turn.
